wrongFullText:
TheTimesCenter has announced artists set for its spring 2012 TimesTalks, which will take place in TheTimesCenter from April-June.

Professionals set for the spring’s upcoming TimesTalks include Golden Globe and Emmy Award-winning actress Julia Louis-Dreyfus (April 13); actor, writer, and producer John Cusack (April 17); internationally acclaimed authors Martin Amis, Margaret Atwood, and E.L. Doctorow (May 2); Oscar, Emmy, Tony, and Grammy award winning director Mike Nichols, currently represented on Broadway by Death of a Salesman (May 7); and Grammy Award winning singer Alanis Morissette (June 19).

Created in 1998, TimesTalks events aim to evoke intelligent and entertaining conversations among some of the world’s most engaging speakers.

For more information and tickets to TimesTalks, click here.
